amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 306 of the bill which authorizes funds for eligible families to continue receiving voucher assistance after the termination of the Disaster Voucher Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 110-53 to strike section 306 of the bill. Section 306 authorizes funds for eligible families to continue receiving voucher assistance after the termination of the Disaster Voucher Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 247 (Roll no. 168).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 247 (Roll no. 168).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
